Calculating a single PCA component

Source: R/NIPALS_PCAcomponent.R
NIPALS_PCAcomponent.Rd

Calculating a single PCA component

NIPALS_PCAcomponent(X)

Arguments

X

Input matrix with rows and columns representing observations and variables.

Value

Returned is a list with the following entries:

Residual X

Residual X matrix.

Scores

PCA component scores.

Loadings

PLS component loadings.

References

Geladi, P and Kowalski, B.R. (1986), Partial least squares and regression: a tutorial. Analytica Chimica Acta 185, 1-17.

  • Arguments
  • Value
